name: Doodle Dungeon
description: I made this game for a class. I mostly tried to fiddle with the design of it and the animation aspects of it. I  still have a lot to learn, but I think it came out alright. All sprites and animations were created by me. This was my first time putting a cut scene in a game. I will probably update this at some point, but for now this is Doodle Dungeon. Walk around as a knight and have fun!
